      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long LevelManager.applyGravity(Level l)
      All Candy instances "fall" when there's empty space in their column.
      static boolean LevelManager.popAllMarked(Level l)
      Refreshes the Candy.State of Candy instances in the level's board that are in a column or row with a length more than two.
      static int LevelManager.processLevel(Level l)
      Iterations of popping the matching Candy instances and then applying the gravity logic to the Level's board.

      Resetting the board based on the original board state.
      void UniGameController.setMainGridDimensions(Level l)
      Creates a number of n*n new columns and rows for the main grid of the Scene, where n is the size of the given Level's board.

      Constructs a StandardLevelBuilder that has a copy of an existing StandardLevel field which we continue building.
